title: Quests Gone ?
body: I just finished  the quest where you need to complete 7 other quests and completed another one after that , that making them 9 quests , how do I get more  , I've got stuck at 90 chaos tokens and I want to get the emote . Do I need to buy rp and get a pass or are there more quests coming .

replies.body: No need to buy tokens just yet. You'll still be getting new daily missions every day until the event ends on 6/29.
